body_html:
I think the general pattern would be:

dataset # this is the dataset you wish to sample with ratio a/b
dataset = dataset.shuffle(x) # x trades off mathematical accuracy and performance
dataset = dataset.repeat()
dataset = dataset.window(b).flat_map(lambda x: x.take(a))

Does that make sense?
body_text:
I think the general pattern would be:
dataset # this is the dataset you wish to sample with ratio a/b
dataset = dataset.shuffle(x) # x trades off mathematical accuracy and performance
dataset = dataset.repeat()
dataset = dataset.window(b).flat_map(lambda x: x.take(a))

Does that make sense?
body:
I think the general pattern would be:

```
dataset # this is the dataset you wish to sample with ratio a/b
dataset = dataset.shuffle(x) # x trades off mathematical accuracy and performance
dataset = dataset.repeat()
dataset = dataset.window(b).flat_map(lambda x: x.take(a))
```

Does that make sense?
